XIII.i.8.A.3.d
.
Payment When the Veteran Is Released From Incarceration During the Clothing Allowance Year
If the Veteran is initially incarcerated or is released from incarceration during the clothing allowance year, pay the Veteran a partial clothing allowance.
Note
:  Partial clothing allowance payments for years during which the Veteran is incarcerated are
not
subject to rounding to even dollars.  Therefore, partial year payments are made in dollars and cents.
Reference
:  For information on calculating the partial year payment, see
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, 8.A.3.b
.
